snippet: The Washington Wizards announced that Randy Wittman would return as their coach next season, retaining the position he took after Flip Saunders was fired in January.
abstract: Washington Wizards announce that Randy Wittman will return as their coach next season, retaining the position he took after Flip Saunders was fired in January.
lead_paragraph: The Washington Wizards announced that Randy Wittman would return as their coach next season, retaining the position he took after Flip Saunders was fired in January.

headline.main: Wittman Will Return as Coach of the Wizards
